function isValidUrl(url) {

/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/

if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;

return input.trim();
}
}

From the brand

LISEN electronic accessory stand helps us break the bad habit of looking down at the phone for a long time

Most comfortable height for the neck, shoulders and neck designed by German scientists according to ergonomics
Preserving a head-up or slightly upward gaze while using electronic devices can successfully avoid development of “text neck”
This new phone stand that is higher than the triangular phone base will be your most valuable product

LISEN New Stand Recommend

TALLER AND MORE PHOTOGENIC STAND, HELP TO CORRECT THE “TEXT NECK”: This cell phone stand holder is in accordance with ergonomic design. Providing you comfortable viewing angle which helps to fix your posture and reduce neck & back strain. The height can be easily adjusted between 7.1in-8.5in(1.4in adjustable range), the angle is adjustable between 5°~85°
USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN: [No bent & tangling & tip over worries] when using while charging. Due to bent cable, the low phone dock maybe fall over. LISEN stylish adjustable phone holder for desk has a reserved charging hole design, supports cable management, [No bent & tangling & tip over worries]. This phone pad will not cover the subtitle when you watch the video
WEIGHTED ANTI-SLIP BASE: This cell phone stand for desk is equipped with a weighted base and an aluminum alloy rod. Therefore, this iPhone stand holder is stable enough to support all smartphones or small tablets, such as 2021 iPad Mini, iPhone 14 pro max 13 Pro/13 Mini/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/12 Mini/iPhone 11/11 Pro/Max/X/MAX/XR/8/8P, Samsung Galaxy S21, S20, Note 10/9/8/Plus, S10/S9/S8, Kindel, Switch, iPad Mini,iPad Air, etc.We recommend the most stable compatible device size is 4-10 inchs
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The pad back and the bottom of this cell phone stand are fully covered by anti-skid silicone, which LISEN iPad stand holder can provide maximum protection for your device from any scratches and slides, grips friendly
WE CARE ABOUT YOU: If the product arrives broken, or get broken within 365 days, please directly contact LISEN for satisfied solution. Any other problem like could not tighten the screw, please also contact us. We sincerely care about every customer’s shopping experience! (Product including: phone stand*1, screw*1, hexagon screwdriver*1, specification*1)






LISEN electronic Accessories stand help to save the bad habit that we are spending more and more time bow head to looking on our mobile phones

  • Choosing LISEN electronic accessories stand, the most suitable height designed by German scientists based on ergonomic shoulder and neck
  • As long as you insist on using it for 1 hour a day, Keep hold head looking up at electronic devices
  • Can effectively alleviate the formation of our “text neck”, help our family enjoy the joy of playing with electronic devices while staying healthy
  • This new style mobile electronic stand will be your most valuable product, higher than triangular cell phone dock, Save you from the bad habit of head down playing phone!

Questions & Answers

Q1: Is this cell phone stands stable for a big phone and tablets?

Answer: Yes. this phone holder can support all cell phones. In addition, LISEN iPhone stand for desk can also stably adapt to small tablets less than 10 inchs, like 2021 iPad mini etc.

Q2: How tall is this cell phone stand holder?

Answer: The height of this desk phone stand is 1.4 inches adjustable, is flush with the face or slightly higher, so that you can be more calm and elegant during video calls.




Thoughtful Storage Base

Aesthetics of desk fashion With a storage base design, this iPhone stand holder can help to organize small things, such as airphones, rings, clips to avoid losing them.

Cable Organizer & Charging Hole

Featured with reserved charging hole and cable organizer circle, this cell phone holder stand is convenient for charging, and make your desk neat and tidy. No worry with cable tangling.

Full Covered Silicone Pad

Fully covered by soft silicone pad (back and feet), it can protect devices from scratch while 4 to 10 inch devices sitting comfortably. And it can support up to 0.53 inch thick phones with case.

Read more

From the brand

TCL 30 SE

Revolutionary Viewing

TCL 30XL

Elevate Your Vision

TCL 30 5G

Maximize Your Entertainment

TCL enjoy more

6.53” FHD+ Dotch LCD display: Powered by NXTVISION, will upgrade your visual experience with the sharper details, vibrant images and allow you to enjoy true-to-life color accuracy in everything you present.TCL 10L Unlocked Android Smartphone is made for the US with a one-year US warranty.
Superior clarity day & night: Coming with a 48MP high-res AI camera(48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP) and 6MP front-facing selfie camera, TCL 10L android phone helps you capture crisp and vivid pictures. The AI-powered camera recognizes and enhances scenes & objects for your best creations.
Compatible with GSM carriers(AT&T and T-Mobile). TCL 10L mobile phone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
Comfortable viewing all day: Auto-adjusting display provides the best viewing experience regardless of lighting conditions. A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day. Please know that on TCL 10L phone WIFI calling is only compatible with T-Mobile.

Superior Clarity

TCL 10L unlocked android smartphone capture the moment like never before with an AI quad camera system that integrates auto-brightness, super resolution, HDR & more. There are vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night. Experience 3 times more brightness and capture greater detail even in the darkest of settings.

Greater View

With the TCL 10L android phone you can find the beauty in little things with a Macro Camera that captures the rich textures, and tiny details of all your favorite things.

Full-Scene Photos

TCL 10L’s 118° wide-angle camera includes 3.3 times more of the world in a single shot. Gather your friends for a beautiful sunset and take an unforgettable photo or video – with everyone in it. Snap a breathtaking landscape and be able to capture the entirety of the beauty around you.

Imaginative Video

With the TCL 10L, you can set up shortcut keys in an instant. Get maximum control so you will know exactly what’s happening on your screen and what you’re touching, making life more convenient and effortless for you.

Read more

Smart Key for Fast Access

The Smart Key allows you to customize your TCL 10L mobile phone to access any dedicated app or feature with the press of a button. Make your phone as unique as you.

Effortless Unlocking

Never worry about your phone getting into the wrong hands again. With the convenience and security of two forms of authentication (Face Key and a fingerprint sensor), you get safe and fast access to your cell phone. One simple touch or glance will bring you straight to your favorite apps or important messages.

Powerful Audio

Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle by connecting up to four speakers or headphones at once. Bring the party to life and share your favorite playlist on the go with a personalized listening experience.

Talkback Blind Mode

Optimized Power A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day.

Network

Compatible with GSM carriers, including AT&T and T-Mobile. TCL 10L unlocked smartphone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

TCL 10L – NXTVISION Display

Optimize your media playback and creative expression with TCL 10L’s NXTVISION visual technology. Experience streaming in a whole new way thanks to an expansive 6.53” FHD+ NXTVISION display with a dedicated display engine that enhances color, clarity and contrast in real time. HDR feature improves ordinary videos so you can enjoy sharp, remastered HDR content no matter the source. Plus, browse and read comfortably with an array of eye protection modes.

Capture greatness with the NXTVISION 48MP AI-powered quad rear camera and 16MP front camera. The quad camera consists of a 48MP high resolution camera, a super wide-angle camera, a macro camera and a depth camera for amazing portraits. Create fun and artistic clips with wide angle and stop motion video modes.

Make life on the go a little easier with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 octa-core processor, and a reliable 4000mAh battery with smart power optimization. Tap-and-go with a customizable interface, Smart Key, Face Key and fingerprint sensor that provide access effortlessly.

From the brand

V+bestlife

We are constantly discovering and meeting the needs of this changing world, we believe in V (victory), we can pursue the best life!

We think instant messaging will be more and more important in our lives and it is! Similarly, we believe that there will be more and more different changes in the demand for instant messaging. In order to allow more people who do not have instant messaging to join the information life, in this field, we are committed to discovering some distinctive and more Easy circulation of cell phones and telephone!

Information spreads faster in this world; we are committed to better understanding needs and producing products that better meet them!

How did we get our start?

We found that some needs were not being met, and then we wanted to address the situation.

What makes our products unique?

Whether it is in different countries, different regions, or different concepts and consumption habits, the development of the world makes consumer demand change extremely fast and huge. We are constantly discovering this change, catching up with this change, meeting this change, and making our products more in line with consumer needs. This is our starting point, and this is why we think our products are different.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99 - $179.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:40 UTC – Details)



Unlocked Smartphone

The TCL 30XL works with most major U.S. carriers, including Verizon, AT&T and T-Mobile (Sprint not included). This android phone is also compatible with Metro PCS, Simple Mobile, Cricket, Ultra Mobile, H2O, Tello, Consumer Cellular, RedPocket (Only GSMA network), Pure talk, Viya, etc. If your phone doesn’t work with Verizon, please restart the phone. If your cell phone experiences an error when making calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices with the assistance of Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative. For Straight Talk and TracFone, this model only supports T-Mobile and AT&T compatible Sim cards but does not support Verizon compatible sim card. This mobile phone isn’t compatible with other CDMA networks, such as Sprint, Assurance wireless, Spectrum, Xfinity, Boost Mobile, etc.

WIFI Calling:

This phone supports WIFI Calling on the following Carriers: T-Mobile, Metro, Straight talk(AT&T and T-Mobile), Simple, Cricket, Ultra.

Technical Parameters：

Display: 6.82 inch V-notch HD+ 20.5:9 display (720 x 1640 pixels)
Screen: LCD
Screen-to-body ratio: 90%
AI Quad Camera: 50MP Main Camera+5MP Ultra-Wide Angle Camera+2MP Macro Camera+2MP Depth Camera
Front camera resolution: 13MP
Chipset: MT6762V
CPU: 4*A53 2.0Ghz + 4*A53 1.5Ghz Octa-Core
GPU: IMG GE8320
Memory: 6GB RAM + 64GB ROM (Expandable up to 512GB with Micro SD card, SD card not included)
Dimensions: 6.78 x 3.03 x 0.36 inch
Weight (g): 204.4g
Battery: 5000mAh 9V2A
2G Bands: GSM 850/900/1800/1900
3G Bands: B2/4/5
4G LTE Bands: B2/4/5/12 (MFBI)/13/66/71/25/26/41HPUE
Sim Card: Single Sim, Nano-sized
Audio: Dual Speaker
Audio Jack: 3.5mm audio jack
System Language: English, Spanish and French

What’s Included

1 x TCL 30 XL Mobile phone
1 x 18W Charger (9V 2A)
1 x Type-C Cable
1 x Sim Card Tray Pin
1 x Quick Guide
1 x LCD sticker
1 x Product Safety Information

Cinematic Viewing Experience – Featuring a 6.82 inch expansive screen with 20.5:9 aspect ratio and dual speakers design, the TCL 30XL android phone allows you to enjoy the thrill of cinematic viewing. The unique TCL NXTVISION Technology is able to boost color, clarity and contrast of visuals while protecting your eyes from harmful blue light. This TCL phone can work as a decent gaming phone, and is also perfect for streaming video and making video calls.
Large Battery, Fun for All Day – The 5000mAh mighty battery of this unlocked android smartphone can power up your entertainment for up to 3 days on one charge (estimated data based on internal lab test). With 18W fast-charging and an on-the-go reverse charging (OTG cable not included) option you can fuel and refuel your mobile phone in an instant.
Powerful, Smooth and Safe – With the 6GB Ram storage and Octa-Core processor, this unlocked cell phone provides you with an instant response time. Keep all of your precious memories with the 64GB built-in storage, and even more with a Micro SD card (sold separately) that lets you add up to 512GB memory. You can also multitask smoothly thanks to the Android 12 operating system and the floating window mode. The phone’s face unlock technology brings a carefree experience with abundant joy.
Seize the Beauty of Life – Explore the allure of highly detailed shots and broad landscape with the 50MP AI quad camera of this android phone. The AI camera system can optimize your picture according to different lighting conditions, and clear any unnecessary object that you select in the background, allowing you to be the protagonist all the time. The 13MP front-facing selfie camera of this stylish smartphone can capture you in a unique way.

Product Description

Please Read Before Purchase!

Please Confrim Your SIM Card’s Compatibility Before Purchasing!

2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B83G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8Ulefone Note 6 Does NOT work with AT&T, Cricket or CDMA Carriers such as Verizon, Sprint, Boost Mobile, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular!It CAN work with GSM Carriers like T-mobile, Metro PCS, H2O Wireless …!

Note:

It will be smoother to use after booting a few minutes.If the elderly use it and need a larger display font, the font can be set to the largest in the background, which is convenient for the elders to use. At the same time, the mobile phone has a children space mode. It can limit the usage time, mobile data and apps, no need to worry that kids will indulge in games, protect their eyes as well.Due to the small memory of the Note 6 cell phone, please close unused programs in time to get a better user experience. For example, when you are not using GPS positioning, please turn it off, then you can get a longer standby experience.

Notice:

If your phone can’t work any other carriers at the first time, you need to activate the sim card on a existing phone which is support you carrier. After you receive the initial activation texts or get 3G signal, put the sim card back into the phone It should automatically pick up the carrier’s network. Or you can contact with the carrier to activate your SIM card.If your Ulefone note 6 can’t connect to data, please input the APN setting by manually, first input Operator SIM and go to settings—>Network&internet—>Moblile network—>Advanced—>Access point Names—>here can be add APN(the‘+’ icon) or change the APN (Edit any access point to change). To find APN parameters you need to manual input, you may ask the shop / website of those Operators, or you can find another handset with a correct working sim card inserted, then use the same path same approach, you can find and read the APN characters of this Operator, and then copy the same character into your note 6.

Note: Please open the back cover of the phone and remove the insulating tape on battery before starting to use. Otherwise unable to charge!

Nano sim*1 + Nano sim*1 + TF card*1Dual SIM Dual Standby128GB extra storage added via TF card(If you received the phone without insulating tape, that’s because the factory has removed the insulating tape from the battery before shipped.)

Super lightweight and compact, weights only 155g and 8.5mm thickness, golden weight ratio creates excellent holding experience, provide compact and well-balanced look and feel. Hold it in hand comfortably and carry it around with ease.

RAM/ROM: 1GB/32GB (Max. Expansion 128GB)CPU: SC7731E, Quad-core 1.3GHzGPU: Mali-T820 up to 600MHzUSB: Micro USB 5 PinMusic Format Supported: MP3, AMR, AAC, FLACImage Format Supported: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNGDimensions (inch): 6.1″*2.87“*0.33”Weight: 155g/0.34lb

6.1 Inch Water-drop In-cell Full ScreenIPS Screen720*1560 High ResolutionFullview Display92.9% Screen Ratio19:5:9 Aspect RatioSmoother Screen Sensitivity

See The World Through HD Camera

5MP Main Rear Camera

Capturing staggeringly beautiful landscape is a great enjoyment, Note 6 equipped with 5MP main rear camera up to F/2.2 aperture has exceptional vision, helping you discover unusual beauty and assisting you record every beautiful moment for lasting forever.

Superb Front Camera Rejuvenates Your Image with Beauty Mode

2MP camera with HDR and beautify function in the front interprets your features thoroughly and beautifully so as to generate stunning selfies. Whether it is against the background of the mottled tree shadows during the day or the city lights at night, a relaxing shot can amaze your protagonist moments.

Night Mode

Regardless of Light or Shade, The Beauty is Always Clear and Moving

Turn on the night scene mode to automatically optimize the shooting effect, so that the details of the photo are deep and the scene is clear and bright, shooting clear and stereoscopic masterpiece for you.

Latest Android 11 Go Edition OS

Your trendy Note 6 Unlocked Cell Phones, it will run smooth and fast based on Android 11 Go OS out of box, bringing a powerful and smooth experience. Application startup speed has been greatly improved, new privacy protection mechanism adopted will protect your privacy and security.

Mighty Quad-core Processor

Powered by powerful processor with 1GB of RAM + 32GB ROM of internal storage that can deliver sufficient performance for all your apps to run smoothly. Be amazed by the outstanding graphics performance GPU that helps output unparalleled images.

3300mAh Long-lasting Battery

Note 6 equipped with 3300mAh battery makes you know what is last endurance, there is less power consumption even you immerse yourself into hearty games and binge-watching.

From the brand

Lusso Gear Family Favorites

Auto Organization Caddy: A multifunctional car and trunk organizer will help you declutter your floor and passenger seats. This foldable backseat automobile holder gives extra storage to any car in a matter of seconds.
9 Storage Pockets: These Car Organizers offer 2 spacious main bag areas, 1 secure rear zipper pocket, 4 built-in cup holders, and 2 additional front-facing mesh pockets to keep any car interior, console or carseat organized.
Secure Safety Handles: The Lusso Gear Car Organizer comes equipped with a set of 2 handles, comfy enough for small and large hands. Your car’s side and middle seat belts can be clipped through for extra road safety.
Driver’s Best Friend: The uses are endless. Use as a toy or snack tray, a mobile office, or for storing police gear. This collapsible car seat storage organizer can do almost anything.
Built to Last a Lifetime: Every Lusso Gear accessory proudly comes with a lifetime warranty. If you encounter any issue with your Lusso Gear Organizer, simply let us know. We’ll work with you to make it right.

Easy-Carry Handles

Two ergonomic carry handles make it simple to bring the Lusso Gear Car organizer (and everything inside it) just about anywhere.

Collapsible Design

Organizer folds flat in an instant thanks to a space-saving design, allowing for easier transport and convenient storage when not in use.

Secure Safety Straps

Convenient straps allow you to safely and securely clip your organizer into your vehicle seat belt so it stays in place, even during sudden unexpected stops.

UMIDIGI is a company that has been committed to providing premium electronic products such as mobile phones, tablet smartwatches, and earbuds for more than 10 years since 2012. BEYOND DREAMS is our motivation. We got a passional team, a professional R&D department, UMIDIGI labs, and our own production lines with more than 300people.

LONG LASTING BATTERY& BIG SCREEN: The unlocked android phones feature a long-lasting battery that helps you power through a day with a 5150mAh battery. With 10w power fast charging, you don’t need to waste too much time on battery. This unlocked cell phones 4G gots a 6.52” HD full large screen with vivid color and wide viewing angles. It offers you a cinema-like immersive visual experience no matter when you are watching movies or playing games.

TRENDY DESIGN, SHINING, AND LIGHTWEIGHT： With shining AG matte design, UMIDIGI G1 all have stunning appearance and color, which can also prevent fingerprints so that the device can retain its pristine look at all times. It is only 195g and is lightweight. Easy to operate.
